snippet: A report released this week "suggests that as many as 27 percent of the 37 million borrowers have past-due balances of 30 days or more," Andrew Martin and Ron Lieber report.
abstract: A report released this week "suggests that as many as 27 percent of the 37 million borrowers have past-due balances of 30 days or more," Andrew Martin and Ron Lieber report.

headline.main: Study Finds a Growing Student Debt Load
